post.body: will do! we had a sighting here as well, more to come.
Saturday we'll be in NYC. Yes, Tom not Jon. ;)
don't know.. I know he checks mine..
whoooho more pictures!
less swelling indeed.
that's ludicrous sales volume!
Dark Knight, Casino Royale, others tbd
chillin with my brother in law...
Heading north for the weekend
NYC or bust
making a virtual walkthrough recording of the mancave for those who want to but can't make it for the grand opening.
trying to decide if I should take tomorrow of
knee deep in terabytes
Gearing up for a short week. Caught up with a lot of family/friends in the last few days.
And peace has been returned to our kingdom.
Merry Christmas! Wishing everyone gets what they deserve!
I've thrown myself into my work to avoid the impending flutter of activity descending on our house.
H-E-L-P!
Trying to spend money as fast as I can. Bittersweet tax plan juggling at work. (and no I don't work for the government)
If anyone has an emergency that need responding to between 3pm today & Friday feel free to call so I can have a reason to leave the house.
